column5: MVIS The Foxconn info has been floating around for awhile but pinning it as a licensee would make sense with better timing now than in previous limited agreements Foxconn typically deepens deployment in next wave tech see idownloadblogcom2019043 on their investment in microLED tech The approach as a MVIS licensee would be similar at this go to production stage and would explain the 3rd party delay thats currently been noted by mgmt This isnt a declaration of fact draw your own conclusions From a businesssupply chainemergingtechshifts perspective though this partnership would seem to be likely and the right gateway moving forward
